posts.post_content:
The following are for sale or trade for Johnny Evers cards I don't have or need to upgrade. Delivery is included. [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url] if interested.
Payment-just about any form of payment is ok.

T3 Bender $425
T3 Lajoie $1800
T213-2 Cobb $950
T216 Tinker $750
Rose PC Schulte $475
